meanings.definition: A person who makes a pledge.
meanings.sent1: The pledgers donated money to help the school.
meanings.sent2: The pledgers signed up to support the charity every month.
meanings.sent3: The pledgers all wore matching hats to show their commitment.
meanings.sent4: The pledgers were like a team, standing together for a common cause.
meanings.sent5: The pledgers stood out in their dedication to the cause.

meanings.definition: Those who commit to a promise or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The pledgers promised to clean up the park every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The pledgers agreed to meet every Friday for their book club.
meanings.sent3: The pledgers joked about forming a secret handshake for their group.
meanings.sent4: The pledgers were like a family, always there for each other.
meanings.sent5: The pledgers were unwavering in their loyalty to each other.
